bibl.seg: SURIEL Bishop, Christian Education and the Fathers of the Church of Alexandria in Late Antiquity.

F. YOUNG, M. EDWARDS and P. PARVIS (Edd.), Papers Presented at the Fourteenth International Conference on Patristic Studies Held in Oxford 2003. Historica, Biblica, Ascetica et Hagiographica = Studia Patristica. 39 (Leuven, 2006) pp. 441-446.
